Class Card

    • project.Card

extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a standard playing card.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Card that)
        Compare to.
        Parameters:
        that - the that
        Returns:
        -1, if this card comes before the given card; 0, if the two cards are equal; 1, if this card comes after the card.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Card that)
        Equals.
        Parameters:
        that, - object of a Card
        Returns:
        true, if the given card has the same rank AND same suit; otherwise returns false.
